description.en: Chameleon follows his owner around picking up dropped items.
description.ar: Chameleon follows his owner around picking up dropped items.
description.br: Um camaleão que segue seu dono e pega itens caídos.
description.cns: 变色龙跟随它的主人并捡起周围掉落的物品。
description.de: Rufe ein Naughty Cameleon herbei welches dir folgt und Gegenstände für dich aufhebt.
description.fi: Chameleon follows his owner around picking up dropped items.
description.fil: Chameleon follows his owner around picking up dropped items.
description.fr: Invoque un mignon bébé caméléon qui suit son maître et ramasse les objets laissés par les ennemis
description.id: Chameleon yang setia mengikuti tuannya berkeliling dan mengambil barang-barang drop.
description.it: Chameleon follows his owner around picking up dropped items.
description.jp: ワンパクカメレオンを召喚・帰還させることができます。
description.kr: 개구장이 카멜레온을 소환하거나 해제합니다. 소환 하였을 시, 주변에 있는 아이템을 자동 습득하게 됩니다.
description.nl: Chameleon follows his owner around picking up dropped items.
description.pl: Chameleon follows his owner around picking up dropped items.
description.ru: Очаровательный детеныш хамелеона, который послушно семенит за хозяином и подбирает предметы.
description.sp: Camaleón que sigue a su dueño y recoge los objetos soltados.
description.sw: Chameleon follows his owner around picking up dropped items.
description.th: Chameleonเดินตามเจ้าของไปเก็บไอเทมที่ดรอป
description.tw: 可招喚變色龍，招喚時會自動獲得附近的道具。
description.vi: Tắc kè hoa đi theo chủ nhân của mình để nhặt những món đồ bị đánh rơi.
